snippet.title: Cotton Fantasy - Limited & Collector's Editions Trailer
snippet.description:
Something sinister is in the making, the willows are vanishing from Fairyland and the Fairy Queen entrusts Silk with solving the case. For a promised lifetime all-you-can-eat willow supply, Cotton is willing to help her old friend out and embark on another adventure together. 

With Cotton Fantasy, the founder of the Cute 'em Up genre returns with a brand-new game in HD graphics and with new shoot 'em up mechanics and a more precise gmaeplay experience than ever before.

Featuring 6 iconic playable characters, 16 colourful and varied scrolling stages, with vertical, horizontal and 3D movement, and an exhilarating soundtrack with iconic remastered tracks from past games, Cotton Fantasy offers a lot of variation on your hunt for the high score. Packaged with a light-hearted story full of charming, fun cutscenes, fully-voiced in Japanese, this is a great and accessible new shoot 'em up game for fans of the series and newcomers alike.
